ee.sk.digidoc
Class Reference

java.lang.Object
  ee.sk.digidoc.Reference
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Reference
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents and XML-DSIG reference block that referrs to a particular piece of signed XML data and contains it's hash code.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Veiko Sinivee
See Also:
Serialized Form

public Reference(SignedInfo sigInfo,
                 java.lang.String uri,
                 java.lang.String algorithm,
                 byte[] digest,
                 java.lang.String transform)
          throws DigiDocException
Creates new Reference

Parameters:
sigInfo - reference to parent SignedInfo object
uri - reference uri pointing to signed XML data
algorithm - sigest algorithm identifier
digest - message digest data
transform - transform algorithm
Throws:
DigiDocException - for validation errors

setTransformAlgorithm

public void setTransformAlgorithm(java.lang.String str)
                           throws DigiDocException
Mutator for transformAlgorithm attribute. Currently supports only one transform which has to be digidoc detatched document transform or none at all.
